title: What is the relationship between alcohol and spirituality according to historical perspectives?
first_phrase: This text explores the relationship between alcohol and altered states of consciousness from a spiritual and historical perspective. It refers to the sacred intoxication experienced by Greek Pythia and sibyls, and the use of wine in ancient rituals as a substitute for the "drink of immortality." The text emphasizes the importance of spiritual transformation and warns that failure to harness the transformative powers of these altered states can lead to negative outcomes.
